### 0. Hello!

Ho ho ho! A minimal Python library that prints a friendly goodbye message.

### 1. Installation

```bash
pip install goodbye-bro
```

### 2. Usage

```python
import goodbye
goodbye.say()
```

## 3. Output

Goodbye, World!

### 4. Why this exists

- Clean example package
- Zero dependencies
- Beginner friendly
- ASCII safe
- No magic, no noise

### 5. Goodbye!

Goodbye!
